system.effect: Scene x2 – Free Action Trigger: Your Pokémon hits a foe with a Move with the Social keyword Effect: The foe becomes Vulnerable for one full round. If the foe is afflicted with Rage, Suppression, Infatuation, or Confusion you may change one of the listed Volatile Status to another listed Volatile Status. Mind Games may only be activated once per Scene per foe. When inflicting Infatuation this way, the object of Infatuation is your Pokémon, regardless of gender.
